basics.name: ACTING GRADE 4 CUSTOMER/BRAND
basics.label: Work in Sales and Management
basics.summary: Obtain a position that will allow me to utilize my strong abilities, educational background and the passion to work well with others. Reliable and friendly who quickly learns and masters new concepts and skills. Outgoing, detail-oriented and very energetic.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Filled with coaching, developing and ensuring the store operations get fulfilled. Supporting and keeping open communication with management. Training and Coaching associates, Monitoring floor coverage and completing workloads. Ensuring to maintain a positive work environment.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Demonstrate the finest customer service. Speak with knowledge and confidence to customers about styles, fits and the latest products. Being part of the team to executes all operational processes effectively. Having to the ability and confidence to sell.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Opened and closed the store, which included counting cash drawers and making bank deposits. Built customer confidence by actively listening to their concerns and giving appropriate feedback.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Ensure giving exceptional service throughout the entire shopping and purchasing experience. Balanced the needs of multiple customers simultaneously in a fast-paced retail environment.

volunteer.summary: Community service with Gap Rolling hills estate. Helped with running spark night. Provided visitors with proper directions.
Twice a year, prepare and feed the less fortunate
Directed Task. Assisted and built with small projects
Twice a month on Tuesday, would help with the kids after school program.

skills.name: Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines
